name: GKGaussianDistribution
desc: A generator for random numbers that follow a Gaussian distribution (also known as a normal distribution) across multiple samplings.

items.name: init(randomSource: GKRandom, lowestValue: Int, highestValue: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a Gaussian random distribution with the specified lower and upper bounds, using the specified source randomizer.

items.name: init(randomSource: GKRandom, mean: Float, deviation: Float)
items.desc: Initializes a Gaussian random distribution with the specified mean and deviation, using the specified source randomizer.

items.name: var mean: Float
items.desc: The mean value of the distribution (also called the expected value or median).

items.name: var deviation: Float
items.desc: The standard deviation of the distribution (also called sigma).
